item.title: Weisfeiler and Leman Go Loopy: A New Hierarchy for Graph Representational Learning
item.description: This paper introduces r-lWL, a new graph isomorphism test hierarchy that surpasses the limitations of the Weisfeiler-Leman test by counting cycles up to length r+2, and its GNN counterpart, r-lMPNN, w…
